About i-businessplan

Helping EB2-NIW, E-2 & L-1 visa applicants create business plans for their U.S immigration process across the world.

Top Quality Business Plan.

At I-businessplan we take care of creating business plans for visa applicants. Our professional team of writers help individuals worldwide create well-positioned propose endeavors that demonstrate substantial merit and national importance.

It's more than writing a plan - It's about working with people to follow their dreams and improve lives.

I-businessplan offers a complete line of services to ensure high-quality business plans, we bring together professionals in several fields with years of experience in visa business plans.

Our History

i-businessplan started in 2023 having prepared multiple business plans covering several industries. We are a business plan company focused on immigration business plans.

Our Mission

To work hand in hand with visa applicants to create plans that can help them achieve their visa goal.

Who we are

We are a multicultural team of professionals in various fields that are fully dedicated to being a support for visa applicants.
